message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO 

The paper deals with generating novel views of a 3D object from a single monocular image, which involves computer vision (CV) and graphics (GR) techniques. The approach is based on a combination of geometric knowledge and deep learning, which falls under the categories of machine learning (LG) and artificial intelligence (AI). Additionally, the paper mentions the ability to handle arbitrary 3D roto-translations, which suggests a potential application in robotics (RO).
